DOC.brief_summary: Study GIPF-003 is a Phase 3b study designed to define better therapeutic use of IFN-gamma 1b in patients wtih IPF. The study will be conducted primarily in Europe and will enroll 210 patients.
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Three-Arm, Phase 3b Study Comparing the Safety and Efficacy of Interferon Gamma-1b With Azathioprine, and Azathioprine Alone in Patients With IPF Receiving Prednisone
